# Logging Information from the Application

- [How to: Log Exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md): Learn more about: How to: Log Exceptions in Visual Basic

- [How to: Write Log Messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md): Learn more about: How to: Write Log Messages (Visual Basic)
